mapper.select: SELECT o.order_id AS orderId, p.product_name AS productName, o.order_qtty AS orderQtty, o.order_date AS orderDate, o.ship_comp_date AS shipCompDate, u.company_name AS companyName, o.status AS status, o.inbound_date AS inboundDate FROM orders o JOIN products p ON o.product_id = p.product_id JOIN users u ON o.b_company_id = u.user_id WHERE o.status IN (10, 11, 12) ORDER BY o.order_date DESC

SELECT o.order_id AS orderId, p.product_name AS productName, o.order_qtty AS orderQtty, o.order_date AS orderDate, o.ship_comp_date AS shipCompDate, o.outbound_date AS outboundDate, u.company_name AS companyName, o.status AS status FROM orders o JOIN products p ON o.product_id = p.product_id JOIN users u ON o.b_company_id = u.user_id WHERE o.status IN (20, 21,22) ORDER BY o.order_date DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE orders SET status = 21 WHERE order_id = #{orderId}
UPDATE orders SET status = 11 WHERE order_id = #{orderId} AND status = 10
UPDATE orders SET status = 12, inbound_date = NOW() WHERE order_id = #{orderId}
UPDATE orders SET status = 22, outbound_date = NOW() WHERE order_id = #{orderId}
mapper.select: SELECT o.order_id, o.s_company_id AS company_id, p.product_name, o.order_qtty FROM orders o JOIN products p ON o.product_id = p.product_id WHERE o.order_id = #{orderId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO products (company_id, product_name, quantity) VALUES (#{companyId}, #{productName}, #{quantity})
